paragraph.heading: 1Libraries
paragraph.paragraph: ISE Eiffel is all about reuse. Thousands of reusable components help you develop your applications by standing on the shoulders of previous developers. Here is the documentation on the principal libraries:

list.item: base/index.html EiffelBase: ISE's acclaimed open-source library covering the fundamental algorithms and data structures of computing science.
com/index.html EiffelCOM : your tool of choice for building and using Microsoft COM components.
lex/index.html Lex & Parse : lexical analysis and parsing libraries.
net/index.html Net : the client-server library for exchanging object structures across the network, between identical or different machine architectures.
store/index.html Store : object-relational database interface library.
time/index.html Time : time and date library.
vision2/index.html Vision2 : the extensive multi-platform graphical library for producing modern GUI applications that will run on Windows as well as Unix, Linux, VMS and other X-based platforms.
web/index.html Web : Web interface library with support for easy development of CGI scripts in Eiffel.
wel/index.html WEL : powerful graphical library for Windows platforms.
